inductive Arg where
  | stx  (val : Syntax)
  | expr (val : Expr)
  deriving Inhabited
  suppressDeps : Bool := false
  deriving Inhabited
def addNamedArg (namedArgs : Array NamedArg) (namedArg : NamedArg) : MetaM (Array NamedArg) := do
  if namedArgs.any (namedArg.name == ·.name) then
    throwError "argument '{namedArg.name}
